vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ναούμ, ὁ indecl. (Heb. נַחוּם;),
Nahum: Luk.3:25.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.25;
son of: Esli (G2069);
father of: Amos (G0301)
§ Nahum, "comfort"
Naum, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:25*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿鴻 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "安慰, 慰藉"
以斯利的兒子並亞摩斯的父親, 基督的家譜 (路 3:25)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿鸿 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "安慰, 慰藉"
以斯利的儿子并亚摩斯的父亲, 基督的家谱 (路 3:25)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Na-hum: « Yên ủi và báo thù ». Xem H5151.
